name: TopCV
description:
Established in 2014, TopCV is now the leading connector between recruiters and candidates. Starting with an online CV Writing Platform, after a short time, TopCV reached top 1 CV Writing Platform in Vietnam. Along with helping user create professional CV online in the simplest possible manner within minutes and providing job seeker a wide choice of jobs, we also specialize in recruitment services focused on newly graduated and mid-career.

What makes us different?
? Caring about clients? value
? Free & easy online CV writing platform for candidates
? Smart and reliable job-site for young people in Vietnam
? Effective HR-platform for recruiters 
? Large and updated everyday candidate database & network 
? Long-term business relationship with clients

As a Startup with nonstop efforts, TopCV now owns nearly 1 million registered users and 5000+ active users creating or updating their resumes on the website everyday.
